1.0.name: wordpress/smartadapt
1.0.description: Responsive HTML5 and CSS3, clean and customizable theme based on Zurb Foundation front end framework. This theme allows you to easily change various aspects of the design: background, logo or header image, etc. Powerful but simple theme with social share button support (facebook like, twitter share, google +1, Pin it) .
